name: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack
name_original: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack
description:
Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack is an action-shooter game developed by High Moon Studios. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Dinobot Destructor Pack is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
